title: The Music is the Life!
content:
Photo by Clinton Steeds, via Flickr (https://www.flickr.com/photos/cwsteeds/)

Today we highlight an example of mixing Gilbert and Sullivan with Dracula, as presented by Faint of Butt! This is nine minutes of pure fun and hilariousness, click to enjoy it :emoji:‍♂️:emoji:‍♀️
author: Brandon Blatcher
